ai-kp9:1.1_0: This is what should be done by those who are skilled in goodness,
ai-kp9:1.2_0: and have known the place of peace.
ai-kp9:1.3_0: Let them be able and upright, very upright,
ai-kp9:2.4_0: greedy for one with few families,
ai-kp9:3.1_0: Let them not do the slightest thing
ai-kp9:3.2_0: that others might blame with reason.
ai-kp9:3.3_0: may they be happy and secure,
ai-kp9:4.2_0: with not a one left out—
ai-kp9:4.3_0: frail or firm, long or large,
ai-kp9:5.3_0: those born or to be born:
ai-kp9:6.2_0: Do not look after anyone else,
ai-kp9:6.4_0: let them not wish pain on each other.
ai-kp9:7.1_0: Even as a mother would protect her child,
ai-kp9:8.1_0: With love for the whole world,
ai-kp9:8.4_0: Does not have misfortune, free of enmity and ill will,
ai-kp9:9.2_0: or lying down while yet unweary,
ai-kp9:9.4_0: for this, they say, is a holy abiding in this life.
ai-kp9:10.4_0: they never come back to a womb again.
ai-kp9:12.1_0: The Book of the Eights is finished.
